sentence.Network_en: I'm doing a theology degree by distance learning.

sentence.Network_en: According to Muslim theology there is only one God.
sentence.Network_cn: 按照穆斯林的宗教信仰,神只有一个.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 神字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 神效〖 surprisingeffect;magicaleffect〗 神学，宗教学〖 theology〗 神乐〖 kagura〗.
theology 理论, theology 神学的, theology 神仙学说
【宗教神学】(Theology) 『人类是唯一的动物，他爱护他的邻居就如同爱护他自己一样，但是如果对方的宗教神学有问题，他会割断 …
terminology n.术语; 专有名词theology n．神学, 宗教anthology n.诗集

list.abs: 称之为自然神学（natural theology）既是在自然现象和创造现象中寻求神的启示的，重视人的思辨（speculation）之神学。
5．实践神学（practical theology）（Practical Theology）——从神学理论的研讨进入实际工作的研究方面。①教牧学（Pastoral Ministry）——尤涉及教会 …
系统神学（Systematic theology）则描述在当代情境下对信仰的理解。
（转载）成功神学（PROSPERITY THEOLOGY） (sunflowerangela, 2010-3-18)基督徒与成功神学 (zhouping, 2010-12-24) 给我留言 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally applying only to Christianity): from French théologie, from Latin theologia, from Greek, from theos 'god' + -logia (see -logy)

entry.def: Theology is the study of the nature of God and of religion and religious beliefs.
A theology is a particular set of religious beliefs and ideas.

example.tran: 异教、宗派及稀奇古怪的宗教信仰

means.word_mean: 1. the rational and systematic study of religion and its influences and of the nature of religious truth
2. a particular system or school of religious beliefs and teachings;
3. the learned profession acquired by specialized courses in religion (usually taught at a college or seminary);

auth_sentence.content: Wilson said, Theology made no provision for evolution.
